data.text: Ti-laamianigi ɠa nɔnɔ ga nà-nuɓusɛiti ma zuai.
Naa ɠa é ba, ta wooɠulana Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ma ga é ɓɔ ti ʋa,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠaa, é ga nii,
Zɔiti ti faiti bosu ma yeeluɠɔ, ɓaa ɠa ɠula ti ma,
Kɛlɛ nɔ̀un, dàavegɛ ga gaaɓaai ta Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-Zɛnvui,
Wa Siyɔn losu ga nu ʋaai,
Ta-ɠundiɠiiti ta tukpɔi ɠaaleʋezu lobɛanii maazu.
Naa ɠa é ba, wo maaʋele ma,
